Title: The Alert
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), John Hoffman, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace and Frankie launch their business, and Bud brings gifts they're reluctant to accept. Sol is upset that Bud wants to fire a longtime employee.
